model

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Board

  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a chessboard as a one dimensional array of "tiles" that hold pieces. Each index of the array represents a different tile on the chessboard, and not all indices are used. The index of a tile is represented as the sum of its rank and file, where rank ranges from 0 to 70 (increments of 10) and file ranges from 0 to 7 (increments of 1) Example board with indices: 70 71 72 73 74 75 76 77 8 60 61 62 63 64 65 66 67 7 50 51 52 53 54 55 56 57 6 40 41 42 43 44 45 46 47 5 30 31 32 33 34 35 36 37 4 20 21 22 23 24 25 26 27 3 10 11 12 13 14 15 16 17 2 00 01 02 03 04 05 06 07 1 a b c d e f g h
    Author:
    Akashkumar Patel, Umang Patel

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public void add(int location,
                Piece p)
        Allows a chess piece to be "added" (placed) onto the board at a given location.
        Parameters:
        location - The index of the space the piece should be added to.
        p - The chess piece to place.

      • remove

        public void remove(int location)
        Removes a chess piece from the board.
        Parameters:
        location - The index of the space to remove a piece from

      • move

        public void move(int from,
                 int to)
        Moves a piece from one space to another.
        Parameters:
        from - The location from which a piece will be found.
        to - The location to move the piece to.

      • getPiece

        public Piece getPiece(int location)
        Gets the piece instance at the given location. The piece is not removed from the board.
        Parameters:
        location - The space on the board to look at.
        Returns:
        The piece instance located in the given space.

      • getLocation

        public int getLocation(Piece p)
        Finds a piece on the board.
        Parameters:
        p - The piece instance to find.
        Returns:
        The integer value of the space the piece was located in.

      • copy

        public static Board copy(Board original)
        Makes a copy of a Board instance.
        Parameters:
        original - The board to make a copy of.
        Returns:
        A new Board instance with the same pieces as the original board

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns a string representation of the board.

        toString in class java.lang.Object
